notes.title: Funding
notes.p: All the authors from Alagappa University acknowledge the financial support by DST-SERB, New Delhi under the Physical sciences, grant sanctioned vide EMR/2016/006302. Also, all the authors gratefully acknowledge for extending the analytical facilities in the Department of Physics, Alagappa University under the PURSE and FIST programme, sponsored by Department of Science and Technology (DST) New Delhi, Govt. of India and Ministry of Human Resource Development RUSA- Phase 2.0 grant sanctioned vide Lt.No.F-24-51/2014 U Policy (TNMulti Gen), Dept. of Education, Govt. of India. The authors also gratefully acknowledged to Ministry of Science and Technology, Taiwan, Project Grant No.108-2811-E-033-500, 108-2911-I-033-502, 108-E-033-MY3 and 108-3116-F-006-002.
